Package org.svvrl.goal.gui.menu

Class AutomatonPopupMenu

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPopupMenu
org.svvrl.goal.gui.menu.AutomatonPopupMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
public class AutomatonPopupMenu
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
An AutomatonPopupMenu is a popup menu for an automaton editor.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    (package private) class  AutomatonPopupMenu.AcceptanceMenu
    This class provides a menu for adjusting the acceptance of a state or a transition.
    (package private) class  AutomatonPopupMenu.AlignmentMenu
    An AlignmentMenu is a menu containing items for aligning states.
    (package private) class  AutomatonPopupMenu.ColorMenu
    A ColorMenu is a menu containing menu items for setting the color of an automaton component.
    (package private) class  AutomatonPopupMenu.DirectionMenu
    A DirectionMenu is a menu for changing the direction of a two-way alternating transition.
    (package private) class  AutomatonPopupMenu.OnStateMenu  
    (package private) class  AutomatonPopupMenu.OpacityMenu
    An OpacityMenu is a menu containing items for changing the opacity of an automaton component.
    (package private) class  AutomatonPopupMenu.PlayerMenu
    A PlayerMenu is a menu for changing the player of a game state.
    (package private) class  AutomatonPopupMenu.StateDisplayMenu
    A StateDisplayMenu is a menu containing several display options for states.
    (package private) class  AutomatonPopupMenu.TextColorMenu
    A TextColorMenu is a menu containing menu items for setting the text color of an automaton component.
    (package private) class  AutomatonPopupMenu.TransitionDisplayMenu
    A TransitionDisplayMenu is a menu containing several display options for transitions.
